attributes.action: Do more to protect employees from both physical and mental harm in the workplace. As a reult of workplace procedures.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Make employers responsible for paying for treatment caused as a result of repetitive strain injury.

Make employers consider the detriment to employees mental health before implementing policies or procedures. 

Ask for the advice of both doctors and psychiatrists before implementing policies and procedures. 

Have the health and safety executive undertake surprise visits in which they assess the working conditions of employees. Including asking the employees to undertake a confidential questionaire.

This questionnaire is to include how many times a employee has to say exactly the same things. 

Do more to protect employees from phyical and mental harm.
